segments.text: That little boy is going to fall any second now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s stretching so far to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch—this is too dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see how unstable that stool is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at them to be careful, but it’s like they’re in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and now the floor is a total mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster zone, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that boy doesn’t hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
